context: I was insensitive to your needs
letters:
Dear [Wife's Name],

I hope this note finds you at a moment when you can reflect on my words with an open heart. I am writing to express my deepest apologies for my insensitivity to your needs recently. It has come to my attention that I have not been as attentive and understanding as you deserve, and for that, I am truly sorry.

I recognize that my actions and words may have caused you pain, and there is no excuse for not being more aware of your feelings. You are an essential part of my life, and your well-being is of utmost importance to me. I regret that my behavior may have made you feel undervalued and overlooked.

Please know that I am committed to making meaningful changes and ensuring that I listen to you more intently in the future. You deserve a partner who is fully present and supportive, and I am dedicated to being that for you.

Thank you for your patience and understanding. I love you dearly and am willing to put in the effort to strengthen our relationship. I hope we can discuss this further when you feel ready.

With all my love,

[Your Name]

My Dearest [Wife's Name],

I hope you can find it in your heart to accept my apology. I've been reflecting on my recent words and actions, and I realize now how insensitive I was to your needs. It pains me to think that I made you feel unvalued or unsupported, especially when all you deserve is love and understanding.

I know that I often get caught up in my own thoughts and forget to fully consider your feelings. I want you to know that it was never my intention to hurt you, but I recognize that intentions do not diminish the impact of my actions. You mean the world to me, and it breaks my heart to know that I may have let you down.

Please know that I am committed to being more attentive and attuned to your needs. I want to create an environment where you feel safe and cherished, where your feelings are acknowledged and respected. You deserve my utmost care and consideration, and I am deeply sorry for falling short of that.

Thank you for your patience with me as I work on being a better partner. I love you immensely, and I truly hope that we can move forward together.

With all my love,

[Your Name]
